value.title: Bias persists in face detection systems from Amazon, Microsoft, and Google

value.title: Susan Bathalon Participating in an ASTM Task group Teleconference on Computer Vision-Based Drowning Detection Systems for Residential Swimming Pools
value.excerpt: Add to Calendar 09/03/2021 2:30 pm 09/03/2021 3:30 pm America/New_York Susan Bathalon Participating in an ASTM Task group Teleconference on Computer Vision-Based Drowning Detection Systems for Residential Swimming Pools Susan Bathalon from the Office of Hazard Identification and Reduction (EXHR) will participate in an ASTM technology task group teleconference to discuss the drowning sensor detection systems in residential swimming pools.

value.title: US federal agencies plan to increase facial recognition use, GAO report says
value.excerpt: Three-quarters of U.S. federal agencies surveyed for a Government Accountability Office (GAO) report are already using facial recognition.
